item.title: Open Fonts for Telugu
item.author: Author
item.description: List of free and open sourced fonts for telugu scripts. To write text in these fonts we do not require to buy or install any other applications, you would only need to add telugu language on your Windows or MacOS Personal Computer or Mobile phone.
